setPasswordText.title: Congratulations and welcome to the Epoch Times family!
setPasswordText.gift: We’ve prepared a FREE gift for you at the end.
setPasswordText.mostOfSubscription: You can get the MOST out of your subscription by setting up your account NOW.
setPasswordText.rememberEmail: Please remember this email for future access!

annualPlanText.title: Opportunity to Save with an Annual Plan!
annualPlanText.agreeToUpgrade: I agree to upgrade to the annual plan of $77 now.
annualPlanText.upgradeBtn: Yes, Upgrade to Annual Plan Now
annualPlanText.note: *(based on a monthly digital subscription plan of $9.99)
annualPlanText.emailSent: An email has been sent to
annualPlanText.details: with the details of your upgrade.

newslettersText.title: Manage Your Newsletter Preferences.
newslettersText.youCanControl: You control which newsletters you receive or not receive.
newslettersText.note: You can enable or disable specific newsletters at any time from your Account Profile.

mobileAppText.title: Stay Mobile with the Honest News You Love
mobileAppText.powerApp: Power up your news experience with our apps. Enter your cell phone number* below and we’ll text you a link to download our top-ranked news apps.
mobileAppText.note: *We’ll never sell or give out your number to any third party.

freeSeatText.title: Give a free seat to anyone who'd appreciate fact-based news!
freeSeatText.description: Your grantee will have unlimited access as long as your subscription stays active. You can enter any email address that has not yet been subscribed to The Epoch Times.

subscriberTipsText.title: Last step–we have 5 quick tips to help you get the most out of your digital subscription.
subscriberTipsText.watchTheVideo: Watch the video below to start reading like a pro.

errorsText.message: Something went wrong, please try again or call our customer service at 833-699-1888.
errorsText.shortMessage: Something went wrong, please try again.

freeGiftText.title: Claim Your Free Gift
freeGiftText.subtitle: An issue of American Essence magazine
freeGiftText.note: *We’ll never sell or give out your address to any third party
freeGiftText.name: *Name
freeGiftText.namesNote: *We only ship within the United States.
freeGiftText.skip: I Don't Want a Free Gift

giftModalText.title: Don’t forget your FREE gift!
giftModalText.desc: We’ll ship a gift (valued at $15) to your mailbox as soon as you finish setting up your account.
